title: Midland Bank Review
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
Some issues in the 1980s have a note saying 'Articles in the Review may be reproduced in whole or in part without permission, but it is asked that acknowledgement of source be given.'
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
